name: TVPlaylist
desc: A collection of media items associated with the Apple TV JavaScript player.

items.name: var mediaItems: [TVMediaItem]
items.desc: An array of media items contained in the playlist.

items.name: var userInfo: [String : Any]?
items.desc: User-defined metadata, like a developer-specific identifier, for a playlist.

items.name: var repeatMode: TVPlaylist.RepeatMode
items.desc: A mode that determines how media items are replayed.

items.name: enum TVPlaylist.RepeatMode
items.desc: The modes that indicate how or whether media items can be replayed.

items.name: var endAction: TVPlaylist.EndAction
items.desc: An action that causes media playback to end.

items.name: enum TVPlaylist.EndAction
items.desc: The actions that cause media playback to end.
